wikipedia_page.main: Colin Newell (July 1973 – 25 November 2020), known as Heavy D or The Boominator, was a British TV personality.

response: Colin Newell, better known as Heavy D, is best known for appearing on Storage Hunters UK, where his catchphrase is "BOOM!" He entered the house on Day 1. He became the fourth housemate to be evicted on Day 20.
*Colin Newell (1973–2020), British reality television personality who was known as Heavy D
*Colin Newell, 47, British television personality (Storage Hunters, Celebrity Big Brother).Heavy D Dead: Celebrity Big Brother Star Colin Newell Dies at 47
